showScoreExcerpt:
"You could call the play featherweight, except that down can get pretty heavy...Right now, there’s no real sense of what Raquel and Vito have meant to each other over the years, so the threats of divorce don’t ratchet up the tension as they ought to. If Ms. Fleming and Mr. Sills could communicate this bond the merrymaking might just matter. It would also help if this oddly chaste sex comedy became rather sexier. In the meantime, though, there’s plenty to divert and amuse. "
